Topic.Title: Yahoo Message Board is all Spam Now

Message.Msg: Poor broke failed Daddy failed Grand Daddy! You spammed this board daily for 12 years, 247 every day and night, so it looks like you finally got (some) of what you deserve. Only a Tool Fool Spammer or the GOP could fail to see their intense failure and hypocrisy. Enjoy!
